quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the thought-provoking TV show 'Black Mirror'!
quizTags: Black Mirror, Netflix, TV Shows, Science Fiction, Anthology

questions.question: Which episode of Black Mirror features a society where people rate each other based on their social interactions?
questions.explanation: 'Nosedive' is the episode that portrays a society where individuals rate each other using a smartphone app, influencing their social status.

questions.question: What is the name of the theme park that allows visitors to experience nostalgic simulations of different time periods?
questions.explanation: San Junipero is the name of the virtual reality-based theme park where visitors can experience different time periods and even choose to live there permanently after death.

questions.question: True or False: The episode 'White Christmas' features an advanced AI assistant named 'Ashley Too.'
questions.explanation: False. 'White Christmas' follows the story of two men sharing disturbing stories, but it does not feature an AI assistant named 'Ashley Too.'

questions.question: What is the name of the game that leads to a nightmarish reality in the episode 'Playtest'?
questions.explanation: 'SaitoGemu' is the name of the mysterious augmented reality game that results in horrifying consequences for the protagonist in the episode 'Playtest.'

questions.question: In the episode 'USS Callister,' what is the name of the virtual reality game that the characters are trapped in?
questions.explanation: In 'USS Callister,' the characters are trapped in a virtual reality game called 'Space Fleet,' which is a creation of the antagonist, Robert Daly.

questions.question: What is the name of the dating app that pairs people together based on their relationship's expiration date?
questions.explanation: The dating app in the episode 'Hang the DJ' is called 'Coach Dating,' which pairs individuals together for predetermined relationships.

questions.question: Which episode of Black Mirror features an intelligent robot dog known as 'Metalhead'?
questions.explanation: The episode titled 'Metalhead' follows the story of a woman trying to survive in a post-apocalyptic world while being chased by an intelligent robot dog.

questions.question: What is the name of the mysterious interactive film in Black Mirror that allows viewers to make choices for the main character?
questions.explanation: 'Bandersnatch' is a special interactive film in Black Mirror that allows viewers to make choices for the main character, influencing the storyline and outcomes.

questions.question: In the episode 'Shut Up and Dance,' what do hackers use to blackmail the protagonist?
questions.explanation: In 'Shut Up and Dance,' hackers use video footage of the protagonist engaging in illegal activities to blackmail and manipulate him.

questions.question: What is the name of the virtual reality game that allows participants to experience others' emotions?
questions.explanation: 'Empathy Link' is the name of the virtual reality game in the episode 'Black Museum,' where participants can experience others' emotions.

questions.question: True or False: The episode 'Nosedive' is set in a futuristic society where people have ocular implants to record everything they see.
questions.explanation: False. In 'Nosedive,' people rate each other using smartphones, but there are no ocular implants to record everything they see.

questions.question: What is the name of the mysterious killer in the episode 'White Bear'?
questions.explanation: Victoria Skillane is the name of the protagonist in the episode 'White Bear,' which features a unique form of punishment for criminals.

questions.question: In the episode 'Hated in the Nation,' what type of robotic creatures are responsible for the killings?
questions.explanation: In 'Hated in the Nation,' robotic bees, known as 'RoboBees,' are responsible for the targeted killings as a result of public shaming.

questions.question: What is the name of the virtual reality game that allows participants to experience their worst fears?
questions.explanation: 'Playtest' is the name of the virtual reality game in the episode of the same name, where participants experience their worst fears.

questions.question: Which episode of Black Mirror features a story set in a dystopian future where individuals earn merits for physical activities?
questions.explanation: In the episode 'Fifteen Million Merits,' people earn merits by pedaling on exercise bikes and can use them to gain access to different opportunities in a controlled society.
